messages.content: I wanted to tell you how as a UKIP MP I can start to make things better in Northampton. Enclosed with this letter is a leaflet 'Why I'd like you to elect me as your new MP' and I would be grateful if you could find a few minutes to read it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Passionate about lowering taxes and letting people spend their own money rather than the state spending it for them.
Campaigning for a big increase in the number of beds at Northampton General Hospital and concrete plans to put forward for building a totally new hospital in the town.
Health, policing, and education will be the primary focus with actions rather than just words.

issues.health: Campaigning for a big increase in the number of beds at Northampton General Hospital and concrete plans for a new hospital in the town.

leaflet.personalStatement: I joined UKIP two years ago after voting for both Labour and the Conservatives in past elections. Like many others I just didn't feel that Labour or the Conservatives were on my side anymore. I have found UKIP to be a decent party run by decent people â€“ people who genuinely want to do what is best for Britain.

images.caption: I'M VOTING FOR TOM RUBYTHON UKIP
